alert.note: Alert for Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Marinette and central Oconto Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gillett, or 19 miles northeast of Shawano, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pound and Oconto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
